S.FORM: Mexico u Mexico sa i labu nu Peimeico, itiza i 23 00 N, 102 00 W. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 1,964,375 km2. ahebal nu lala'ay sa 1,943,945 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 20,430 km2 hamin nu tademaw sa 123,166,749.kakalukan umah sa 54.90 , kilakilangan umah sa 33.30 , zumaay henay umah sa 11.80 . . , . Mexico nu Amilikan talu Indian a tademaw nu babalakiya a niyadu'.kitakit kasi nganganan nu sumamaday a Maya lalangaw, Toltec lalangaw atu Aztec lalangaw u Mexico Indian a tademaw kupa lekalay. , , , . Mexico nuni kacaayan nu likisi idaw ku sandalu a kanatal , kupkupan a niyadu' , sanglacay a kinkinman , munabaway i bayubayuwan a kanatal a nika bangcalay asingangan. tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Mexico City . kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 16 bulad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Enrique Pe√±a Nieto, micakat a demiad sa i 2012 a mihca 12 bulad 1 demiad. likisi 1548 Real de Minas de Guanajuato 1555 . Spain tademaw i kunyun sabaw enem (16) a seci sepat a pulu' icapitu makatepatu ba'tu misangan i Guanajuato tu pawlai, itini i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku walu (1548) a mihcaan niyadu pangangan han tu Real de Minas de Guanajuato, cacay a malebut lima a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku lima (15555) a mihcaan misanga tu misataday a kiwkay. . katukuh i sabaw tu walu (18) a seci, Guanajuato mala sanglacay a kin nu ka kutkutan, naw Mexico sa kalimucisangay nu a tukay, patideng tu bangcalay a aluma i Paluo ke' a wayway nu luma'. . mikutkut tu ba'tu ku sakakapah nu sakaudip, micunus tu siidaay atu pakuyuc nu kababenisan , sisa mapatideng ku Guanajuato i sabaw tu siwaw (19) a se ci mala misitekeday a icelangny nu tademaw. . . Guanajuato mililis tu sauwac patideng tu luma', sawni kaletepan nu balad. numalimaday a niyaduay nu tademaw ahican mipuud ku balat papatideng tu luma' i pabawsa, i duse pinakuni patideng tu sapalaliw tu nanum a pungkan, caay kakapah kunipisanga tu lalaliwan tu nanum. 1960 . katukuh i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan, sanga' satu tabakiay a cacascassan, pakayda satu isasa nu buhung kiya mapalaliw kuyu nanum. 1988 . nanutawya un babalaki ni sangan tu buhung nisa buhungan tu sapalaliw tu nanum, nikudan satu samad han mala caculilan nu tademaw atu kakaydan nu kadideng, mala Guanajuato nu picidekan nu kakaydaan, mipadang tu Guanajuato i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku walu(1988) a mihcaan macakat i Langhekuo kitakit nu lalangaw uliwan namaka babalakiya. Guanajuato kitidaan 14 33 86 119 . Mexico nutipan sibiyaw tu Taypingyun , walian Mexico wan atu Caribbean a bayu , pasayda i saetipyu , i peiwa sabaw sepat tulu a (14 33) bataan idaw ku tulu atu kadaan tutipan walu a bataan idaw ku enem cacay a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku siwa(86 119). . . midungdung tu bayu u dadipasan a enal, i teban han u talakaway nu kilangkilangan nu bayubuyuan, pasu yadah nu silamalan nu buyu'. nutipan pasu satanayu'sa sananay nu California subal , hiyan ku Taypinyung atu California a disapan pababenisen, waliyan timulan u masa enal a Yucatan a kumay , Mexico satalakaway nu Oreho a Sapa San . micidekay a kapah sepat a lasubu tu pina a mihcaan likis nu Spain malimaday a nisangan tu luma'. makayda i teban nu nabakuan a pukang makayda muculi. , sangangiwngangiw sa duducen ku buyu misanga' tu luma'. . itini i Mexico sasinganganay tu maacakay nu tademaw i puoukun. . Guanajuato i Mexico teban nu talakaway nu buyu' u sabangcalay nu Spain nikalimadan a buyu'. Na Huw Tuo najuato kusa limulakay, katukuhan ku pikulisimasean , katuuda ku tademaw i macimacian, i sananal acacay nu Guanajuato acaay ka yadah nu tademaw. Guanajuato ngangiwngangiw sananay a ba'ba'tuwan a dadan atu punkan nu cacaulilan a picidekan, nika Mexico a tademaw saan u maacakay nu mapataya a maacakay a tademaw nu puoukun kiya satabakiay nu picidekansa, amisilsil tu cacaya a tatukian kiya taneng micumud miadih tu aadihan. kitidaan 5700 . . talakaw han makaala tu lima a malebut pitu a lasubu (5700) a lawat, Ma de la a buyu' nu Mexico a angangan nu buyu'. Mexico itidaac i nuamisan a Amilikan pankai, isasaan a California kumay itida i Taypinyung atu Cocos pankuwai. . kitidaan sa, idaw ku kitidaan misulitay a tademaw saan Tewan tepiy ke' tisiya nuwalian sa nutebanan a Amilikan , itidaay a nakamuwan nu cence sa, Mexico atu Amilika Canada u amisan a Amilikan ku sausi. demiad . , . Mexico masa hicahicay kiya ku demiad, amisan u caledasay nu likenlikenan a demiad, timul han idaw ku caledesan a kilangkilangan a demiad. Mexico angangangan nu sawac idaw ku Bravo (Pu La Wo ) sauwac, Balthus (Pa El Sa Se ) sauwac atu Yaki (Ya Ci ) sauwac. 1915 1521 1522 . cacay a malebut siwaw a lasubu cacaay a bataan idaw ku lima (1915) a mihcaan Spain a malimaday a tademaw midebung tu Mexico , cacay a malebut lima a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku cacay (1521) a mihcaan mala Spain kalimadan a niyadu', cacay a malebut lima a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1522) a mihcaan itini i Mexico patideng tu baluhay a Spain cungduci. 1810 9 16 9 16 . cacay malebut walu a lasubu cacay a bataan (1810) a mihcaan siwa a bulad cacay a bataan idaw ku enem a demiad, Eda elke palekal malepacaw, malingatu misatadas malepacaw, mikining tuni palekalan, nikuda patideng tu siwa a bulad cacay a bataan idaw ku enem a demiad u Mexico picidekan a demiad. 1821 8 24 . .1823 . cacay a malebut walu a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku cacay (1821) a mihcaan walu a bulad tasa a bataan idaw ku sepat a demiad mihapu tu misiteked sa. saka tusa a mihcaan tu lima a bulad Yituel pide patideng tu Mexico kanatal .cacay a malebut walu a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tulu (1823) a mihcaan mihapu tu Mexico kunhekuo , saka tusa a mihcaan patideng tu Lanpankunhekuo 1846 .1848 , . cacay a malebut walu a lasubu sepata a bataan idaw ku enem (1846) a mihcaan Amilika palekal midebunga tu Mexico a malepacaw. cacay a malebtu walu a lasubu sebat a bataan idaw ku walu (1848) a mihcaan Mexico Amilika masasulit tu kiyaku, Mexico pabeli tu i amisay tusa a lasubu tulu a bataan(230) a mang pin fun kunli a lala' kelicen sipabeli i Amilika . 1867 , , .1910 . cacay a malebut walu a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku pitu (1867) a mihcaan France , United Kingdom , Spain atademaw mitebungay a tademaw bahbahen i Mexico . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan (1910) a mihcaan mincu kemin malinges, saka tusa a mihcaan belinen nuheni ci Tiya se mikuwanay. 1914,1916 .1917 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku sapat(1914), cacay a malebut siwaw a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku enem (1916) a mihcaan Amilika miculcul tu hitay midebung tu Mexico , nina tatusaay a kanatal mapudun kani kalecabayan. cacay a malebut siwaw a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku pitu (1917) a mihcaan patahekal tu sinfa, mihapu tu kanatal a ngangan u Mexico hecunkuo . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan CIA List of current heads of state and government
